participant_1.background:

i m dissatisfied with the school life i ve had so far.
i enjoy skiing.
I'm proud to have a happy and healthy relationship with my partner.
Music is an important part of my life, and I love to listen to it when I'm working, relaxing, or just hanging out.

i m a graphic designer.

content.text: What do you do for a living?
I'm my own boss, I'm a graphic designer. What about you?
I'm a student right now, but I'm hoping to go into music after I graduate.
Oh that's cool. What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different types of music, but I'm really into indie rock and alternative right now.
Nice, I like a lot of that too. I'm also really into hip hop.
Cool, I like some hip hop too. Who are some of your favorite artists?
I like Kendrick Lamar, Kanye West, and J. Cole.
Nice, I like all of those artists too. I also like Chance the Rapper and Childish Gambino.
Oh yeah, I like those guys too. I'm a big fan of hip hop in general.
Me too. I think it's a really versatile genre.
Yeah, it can be. It can be really fun and upbeat, or it can be really serious and thought-provoking.
Exactly. I like that it can be whatever you want it to be.
Yeah, me too. It's a great genre.
Yeah, it is.
What are some of your favorite bands?
I like a lot of different bands, but I'm really into The Killers, Arctic Monkeys, and The Black Keys right now.
Nice, I like all of those bands too. I'm also a big fan of The Strokes and The White Stripes.
Oh yeah, I like those guys too. I'm a big fan of indie rock in general.
Me too. I think it's a really great genre.
Yeah, it is. It's so diverse and creative.
Yeah, it is.
What are some of your favorite songs?
I have a lot of favorite songs, but I'm really into "The Suburbs" by Arcade Fire, "Under the Pressure" by The Killers, and "I Bet You Look Good on the Dancefloor" by Arctic Monkeys right now.
Nice, I like all of those songs too. I'm also a big fan of "Last Nite" by The Strokes and "Seven Nation Army" by The White Stripes.
Oh yeah, I like those guys too. I'm a big fan of indie rock in general.
Me too. I think it's a really great genre.
Yeah, it is. It's so diverse and creative.
Yeah, it is.
